ppy/osu.summary: Recent activities in the osu repository include the addition of basic difficulty and performance calculation for the Autopilot mod on the osu! ruleset, as well as updates to osu!taiko, such as further considerations for rhythm, star rating and performance points rebalance, and stamina balancing. These changes aim to enhance gameplay and provide a more accurate representation of player performance.

ppy/osu-wiki.summary: The osu-wiki repository has seen recent updates, including the addition of team submissions for the MWC 7K 2025, as well as new event pages, such as the ANZT6W tournament article. There have also been updates to existing pages, including translations and retranslations of various articles, demonstrating ongoing efforts to maintain and expand the osu! wiki.

ppy/SDL3-CS.summary: The SDL3-CS repository has received an update to its bindings, incorporating pen support for iOS and Android, as well as removing an outdated file. This change is part of ongoing efforts to maintain and improve the compatibility of the SDL3-CS library with various platforms.
